title: Looking for ADC for Ranked 5s (Silver +)
body:
(Sorry for all the posts recently, trying to tryout people everyday.)
Looking for ADC Main primarily good at the champs that a dominating the game currently, and has a medium-extensive champion pool. As well as putting time and effort into the team and progressing and getting better. We aren't looking for a 5 game win streak and then you leave, we're looking to build as a team and become a family.
Practice is generally at 9:30 EST, so let me know if you can make it.
Please Add me OR fill out this form and Ill get back to you.
Role:
Rank:
Age:
Method of Communication(Mandatory):
3 Main Champs:
Anything else you'd like to add?

Thanks, Yasuo out.
{{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Role:ADC
Rank:Plat 4
Age:19
Method of Communication(Mandatory):have all
3 Main Champs:Kalista, ashe, sivir(can play all)
Anything else you'd like to add?add me on Cynanthr, ill be playing on that acc most

Role: ADC
Rank: plat 5
Age: 16
Method of Communication(Mandatory): Skype, Curse, Ts
3 Main Champs: Vayne, Tristana, Kalista
Anything else you'd like to add? Nah
